de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.data

Interface SparseNumberVector<N extends Number>

  • Type Parameters:
    N - Number type
    All Superinterfaces:
    FeatureVector<N>, NumberVector<N>, SparseFeatureVector<N>, SpatialComparable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SparseDoubleVector, SparseFloatVector

    public interface SparseNumberVector<N extends Number>
extends NumberVector<N>, SparseFeatureVector<N>
    Combines the SparseFeatureVector and NumberVector.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Factory for sparse number vectors: make from a dim-value map.
